Hubble @MeetHubble ä¹Ÿæ­£ç§¯æå‡†å¤‡ï¼Œå…¨åŠ›æ”¯æŒå‡çº§åçš„BNB Chain é“¾ä¸Šæ•°æ®åŸºå»ºï¼Œèµ‹èƒ½æ›´å¤šç”Ÿæ€é¡¹ç›®ã€‚

Under CZ's powerful momentum, the BNB Chain ecosystem has rapidly broken into the mainstream. Now, @BNBCHAIN has played its strong card: slashing network gas fees to 0.05 Gweiâ€”a full 50% reduction. This drastically lowers user transaction costs and takes the on-chain experience to new heights.

From the U.S. to Singapore, my in-depth conversations with BNB Chain's front and back-end teams revealed a deeply ingrained builder DNA. They have a clear vision of their strengths, humbly learn from other ecosystems, and commit heavily to technical development. In this environment, my expectations for next year's new BNB chain launch are higher than ever.

Hubble @MeetHubble is actively preparing to fully support the upgraded BNB Chain's on-chain data infrastructure, empowering more ecosystem projects.

$BNB. Onward.

During this morning's meeting, @Leoninweb3 pointed out that we're stepping onto the "Noah's Ark" of the on-chain era. While we've secured our ticket, actually getting on board still requires further validationâ€”a thought that serves as both motivation and a reality check for our team.

Building on-chain data infrastructure truly presents unique challenges. Our institutional clients are highly sophisticated, with expectations for data comprehensiveness, real-time delivery, and system stability that far exceed what we encountered during our Trading Bot days. Yet this is precisely where @MeetHubble sees our growth opportunityâ€”to establish ourselves as our clients' most trusted data platform provider.

From a data analytics perspective, on-chain data's complexity and real-time demands significantly surpass those of traditional financial data. This requires deeper investment in our technical architecture and service reliability. Over the coming month, we'll be rolling out upgrades to our existing infrastructure to better support diverse multi-chain data scenarios.

tweets.content:
Why Weâ€™re Building Real-Time On-Chain Data Infrastructure @MeetHubble 

Over the past few weeks in NYC and LA, weâ€™ve met dozens of builders and founders in the on-chain data space. While the industry is buzzing about stablecoins, RWA, and new on-chain use cases, one reality remains unchanged: to make any of this work, you need reliable, high-quality data. 

Yet many existing providers struggle with high latency, fragmented coverage, and instabilityâ€”exactly the problems @MeetHubble  was built to solve.

Parsing on-chain data is inherently complex. Weâ€™re standing on the shoulders of giants while rapidly iterating, but the market moves even faster. 

Just as Solanaâ€™s meme season winds down, activity surges on BNB Chain, Ethereum, and Hyperliquidâ€”each bringing unique data demands. 

Even niche verticals like crypto tax compliance now face stricter regulations, driving urgent need for tailored on-chain solutions.

Hubbleâ€™s approach is simple: We deliver flexible, real-time, high-fidelity on-chain data APIs for critical use casesâ€”think trade monitoring, tax reporting, or risk management. 

Because we believe the best way to prove our value is by solving your toughest data challenges first.

If your team needs:
âœ… Low-latency on-chain data
